Yesterday the 2024 World Stage Ivory Celebration
was launched in
Lanfang City, Hebei Province, China. This is  The
International Theater Institute's important event is held globally on
March 27 every year since
1962. After a 7-year hiatus,
this year's World Theater Day celebration has returned to
China to be held.  Held at the
L Ward International Theater Park, a
roundtable dialogue between theater professionals from
around the world was one of the
main highlights of the event, with organizers
emphasizing the role of theater in
conveying  values ​​of
human civilization through storytelling
as well as the importance of communication and
understanding in bridging
cultural differences on the first day of the event

older female customers, to attract customers and

Thanh Khat, both restaurant managers, for

other subjects, Phan Thi Cam Vien and Tran Thu
Ngan, were arrested.
This morning, a container truck caught
fire while traveling on
Phu My Bridge, District 7, Ho Chi
Minh City at around 6:30 a.m. The container truck was
driven by a driver.  Phu My bridge
heading from Thu Duc city to District 7 while the
car was going downhill on the bridge in Tan
Thuan Dong ward, the front of the container truck suddenly
burst into smoke. The male driver
quickly jumped out of the car, but the woman immediately
caught fire.  The
front of the vehicle was doused with disinfectant because the vehicle was stopped on the bridge, so the
rescue and extinguishing of the fire was difficult. Afterwards, the
District 7 fire police force
arrived at the scene to spray water to extinguish the
fire. However, the front of the container truck was damaged.  The
cause of the fire
is being investigated and
clarified. Also this morning in Binh
Phuoc province, a container truck overturned on
Highway 14, causing dozens of tons of cashew nuts to
echo on the road. All images of the
accident were caught on camera.
According to initial information, about 6 o'clock,
a container truck carrying dozens of tons of cashews was
traveling on Highway 14 from
Ho Chi Minh City to Dak Nong province when it
reached a public road in the village of Duc

causing the vehicle to force across the middle of the road and
hit a seven-seater vehicle running in the
opposite direction. Dozens of tons of cashew nuts were thrown
from the container truck's trunk, spreading fabric all over the
road. The container driver was
seriously injured and was taken away by people.  go to the emergency room, the

Paris 2024 Olympic Committee is said to have decided
to choose the T-year park in the middle of the
Paris Metropolitan Center as the place to hold the Olympic torch-lowering ceremony.
This park is also located between two
famous places, London and
La
Concord square.
A source said
discussions about the location of the Olympic torch took
place yesterday and the name
Toies Park was kept secret until the
official announcement also according to the source on
Tower F located near Toies Park.  was
chosen by the Olympic Committee and the Paris city government for the opening event of the
2024 Olympics from the beginning. However,
this place was later removed due to its inconvenient location
to gather crowds.
The agreement
allows the crowd to easily access the event
and is also convenient for ensuring
security. The Olympic torch relay will
begin on April 16 from
Olympia park in Greece to the French city of Mass
on April 16.  On May 8, the torch will then
be paraded through nearly 400 cities and
towns across France and ending in Paris on
July 26. This
